overview: After a public scene was caused by her abusive boyfriend, James, Olivia Davis flees the relationship with the help of a kind stranger, Thomas. Fearing for her safety from James, Olivia stays with Thomas for a while. Meanwhile, Thomas is working on a mystery project that Olivia only gets glimpses of. Not trusting herself and being eaten up by past trauma, she decides it's time to leave. Fearing for her safety out there on her own, Thomas is forced to confront and take action to keep Olivia safe. She is now forced to take action, find out what is going on, and escape her trauma.
title: Outlier
